definition: unbearable/unable to endure/can't stand
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
(negative prefix)/not/no
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: He like dogs, but I can never stand the yelping.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡狗，但我實在受不了那汪汪的叫聲。

sentences.english: And you analyze everything, and that kind of scared me at first.
sentences.chinese: 你瘋狂，你分析所有的事，那一開始讓我有點受不了。

sentences.english: At such an assembly as this, it would be insupportable.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的舞會上跳舞，簡直讓人受不了。

sentences.english: As I see it, we can't even afford to have him arrested or accused.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，要是他被捕或受到起訴，那咱就受不了。

sentences.english: I've always found her unbearably nosey.
sentences.chinese: 我發覺她總愛管閒事真讓人受不了。

sentences.english: I absolutely hate my work. I can’t bear it any more.
sentences.chinese: 我煩死我的工作了，我再也受不了啦。

sentences.english: Black ant cant stand stimulation in a pet like the giant killer.
sentences.chinese: 黑蟻受不了激，一氣之下就想對擎天下殺手。

sentences.english: I can't endure cats in house.
sentences.chinese: 屋子裏有貓，我可真受不了。

sentences.english: I can't stand the smell of petrol and always become dizzy in a car.
sentences.chinese: 我受不了汽油味，每次坐車都覺得頭暈。

sentences.english: Maybe you'll get tired of boatyard fees and decide to manage by yourself with a trailer.
sentences.chinese: 也許你受不了船塢的收費了，決定用拖車解決問題。

sentences.english: I know what you mean, it really turn me off.
sentences.chinese: 我明白你的意思，我真受不了他那個樣子。

sentences.english: It is too much of a fag .
sentences.chinese: 那是一件受不了的苦活。

sentences.english: Then the black dragon can't stand it , it escaped to Bailongjiang .
sentences.chinese: 小黑龍受不了於是逃到了白龍江。

sentences.english: Widow Douglas is trying to civilize me?and I won't stand for that.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯寡婦想要教化我，那我可受不了。

definition: intolerable
hard to endure/unbearable
to be unable to tolerate or endure/to find sth difficult to manage
to bear/to endure
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
won't do/be out of the question/be no good/not work/not be capable
unbearable
to have had enough of/to be fed up with/to have had one's fill of
cannot help/unable to bear
more than one can bear (idiom); at the end of one's patience/the last straw
to dislike/to loathe/disagreeable/troublesome/annoying
unbearable/terrible/enough/unlikely
unwell/feeling ill/to feel uncomfortable/uneasy
to blow one's top/to be driven mad/to become frantic
to be unable to repress sth/to be unable to contain oneself
